title: Veilist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. They gain Hexproof until the end of the next day. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Hexproof players aren't legal targets for abilities, votes, and whispers. Players will be told that they can't target them with those actions upon attempting to do so. Abilities who already have a Hexproof player as their target won't resolve.
- With the Necronomicon, when you use your ability, you may choose another player who you've made Hexproof at any point in the game previously and they're dealt a Powerful attack.

desc:
